MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:11am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:38am on the 10th of March 2021.
